TITLE: Item 7.01
TEXT: Item 7.01. Regulation FD Disclosure. On December 8, 2025, The Boeing Company (the “Company”) issued a press release announcing the completion of its acquisition of Spirit AeroSystems Holdings, Inc, a Delaware corporation. A copy of the Company’s press release is furnished as Exhibit 99.1 to this Current Report on Form 8-K. On December 8, 2025, The Boeing Company (the “Company”) issued a press release announcing the completion of its acquisition of Spirit AeroSystems Holdings, Inc, a Delaware corporation. A copy of the Company’s press release is furnished as Exhibit 99.1 to this Current Report on Form 8-K. The information in this
TEXT: Item 7.01, including the exhibit referenced herein, shall not be deemed “filed” for purposes of Section 18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the “Exchange Act”), nor shall it be deemed incorporated by reference in any Company filing under the Securities Act of 1933 or the Exchange Act, except as shall be expressly set forth by specific reference in such filing.
